attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish the TV License now.
Simply that. The BBC can sink or swim. If it's half as good as it thinks it is, it will do fine against the competition. And if it sinks - no loss.
There is now no need for the BBC to be subsidised any longer.  
Why should poor people be taxed to keep the BBC in clover?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
